## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G17680](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G17680)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EBS1</u>
- **Gene Name:** exclusively sensitive to bicarbonate 1
- **Description:**   SBP (S-ribonuclease binding protein) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2129336
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
